sourcesContent:
<template>
  <vueper-slides
    v-if="pageName !== ''"
    :page-name="pageName"
    :style="`height:${isSmartphone ? '75vh': ''};width:100%;`"
  >
    <!-- здесь будет потом componentsNames -->
    <vueper-slide
      style="height:75vh;width:100%;"
      v-for="i in 1"
      :key="i"
    >
      <CarouselCard
        :page-name="pageName"
        component-name="presentation"
      />
    </vueper-slide>
  </vueper-slides>
</template>

<script>
import TheHeading from "@/components/heading/TheHeading.vue";
import TheContent from "@/components/content/TheContent.vue";
import CarouselCard from "@/components/carousels/CarouselCard.vue";
import Consumer from "../context/Consumer.vue";

export default {
  name: "IndexView",
  components: {Consumer, TheContent, TheHeading, CarouselCard},
  data: () => ({
    pageName: ""
  }),
  created() {
    this.pageName = this.$route.name;
  },
  computed: {
    //@ts-ignore
    height() {
      //@ts-ignore
      return this.$vuetify.breakpoint.height;
    },
    isSmartphone() {
      return this.$vuetify.breakpoint.xs;
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
